about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a Moroccan full stack developer and media buyer, currently CEO & Co-Founder at brandhub.ma and Co-Founder at Multi Brands based in Morocco. I'm passionate about building scalable web apps, AI-powered assistants, and high-converting digital strategies. My mission is to merge technology, automation, and creativity to create measurable business impact.

innovation.title: We Lead the Innovation
innovation.description: Pioneering cutting-edge solutions with AI, 3D technology, and full-stack development. We transform ideas into immersive digital experiences that push boundaries and set new standards in the industry.

testimonials.quote2: Professional, creative, and technically sharp. A pleasure to work with.

testimonials.quote14: The dashboard he built gives us real-time insights into our entire operation.

testimonials.quote16: His AI automation saved us 40 hours per week. Game changer for our business!

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Real results from real projects — explore how we solve complex challenges

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform Transformation
ecommerce.description: Complete digital transformation of a traditional retail business into a thriving online marketplace.
ecommerce.challenge: The client had zero online presence and needed to compete with established e-commerce brands. They required a full-stack solution with inventory management, payment processing, and marketing automation.
ecommerce.solution: Built a custom React-based e-commerce platform with Node.js backend, integrated with local payment gateways, and implemented AI-powered product recommendations. Added automated email marketing and social media integration.

healthcare.title: Medical Practice Management System
healthcare.description: Comprehensive SaaS solution for managing multiple dental clinic locations with centralized dashboard.
healthcare.challenge: Manual appointment scheduling, paper-based patient records, and no visibility across multiple clinic locations. Staff spent hours on administrative tasks instead of patient care.
healthcare.solution: Developed a cloud-based dental management system with real-time appointment scheduling, digital patient records, automated reminders, and business intelligence dashboards for management insights.

aibot.title: AI WhatsApp Sales Assistant
aibot.description: Multilingual AI-powered WhatsApp bot for 24/7 property inquiries and lead qualification.
aibot.challenge: Missing leads after business hours, difficulty managing Arabic/French/English inquiries, and sales team overwhelmed with basic questions instead of closing deals.
aibot.solution: Integrated GPT-4 powered chatbot with WhatsApp Business API, trained on property database, capable of answering questions in 3 languages, scheduling viewings, and qualifying leads automatically.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about my services and expertise

q1.question: Who is the best web developer in Morocco?
q1.answer: As a full stack developer with 5+ years of experience, I specialize in building modern, SEO-optimized web applications using React, Node.js, and AI integration. I have successfully delivered 150+ projects for clients across Morocco, France, and the Middle East, focusing on e-commerce, SaaS platforms, and custom business solutions.

q2.question: What SEO services do you offer in France and Morocco?
q2.answer: I provide comprehensive SEO services including technical SEO audits, on-page optimization, structured data implementation, multilingual SEO (French, English, Arabic), local SEO for Morocco and France, and advanced schema markup for Google AI Overviews. My approach combines technical expertise with data-driven strategies to improve search rankings and organic traffic.

q3.question: How much does it cost to build a professional website in Morocco?
q3.answer: Website development costs vary based on complexity and requirements. A basic business website starts around 15,000 MAD, while advanced e-commerce platforms or custom web applications range from 50,000 to 200,000 MAD. I provide transparent pricing with detailed project scopes and offer flexible payment plans for Moroccan businesses.

q4.question: Do you offer AI integration services for businesses?
q4.answer: Yes, I specialize in AI integration including ChatGPT-powered chatbots, custom AI assistants, machine learning models, and automated workflows. I have implemented AI solutions for customer service, lead generation, content creation, and business intelligence across various industries in Morocco and the Middle East.

q5.question: What is your typical project timeline?
q5.answer: Project timelines depend on scope and complexity. A standard business website takes 2-3 weeks, e-commerce platforms require 4-6 weeks, and complex web applications need 8-12 weeks. I follow agile methodology with regular updates and milestone deliveries to ensure transparency and quality throughout the development process.

q6.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
q6.answer: Yes, I offer comprehensive maintenance packages including security updates, performance optimization, content updates, and technical support. My support plans range from basic monthly maintenance to full-service packages with 24/7 monitoring, ensuring your website stays secure, fast, and up-to-date.
